title: OhMyFood
description: Mobile-first website listing gourmet restaurant menus with CSS animations.
competences: This project helped me improve my responsive design, CSS animations, and Figma-based integration skills.

title: Kasa
description: Front-end redesign of Kasa with React (Vite): SPA using React Router, reusable components, and responsive Figma integration. Local JSON data while waiting for the API.

title: Sophie Bluel
description: Building a dynamic web page for interior designer Sophie Bluel using JavaScript and a provided API: fetching projects and filtering by category, an admin login page with token-based authentication (token persisted in sessionStorage across reloads and reset when returning to the login page), and an accessible modal to upload new media with validation/preview and project deletion. Front-end built from the provided HTML/Figma mockups: DOM manipulation and event handling, asynchronous fetch requests, error handling, and forms (error message under the password field).
